intro: Epilobium × probstii, commonly known as the hybrid willowherb, is a perennial herbaceous plant native to Europe. The plant typically grows in moist, nutrient-rich soils along stream banks and wet meadows. It produces small, capsule-like fruits that contain numerous seeds, facilitating its spread. Epilobium × probstii is often used in ecological restoration projects due to its ability to stabilize soil and support biodiversity.
